titles.title: FHA Mortgage Upgrade Act

To amend section 203 of the National Housing Act to increase the maximum mortgage amount limitation under the single family housing mortgage insurance program of the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development for homes in nonhigh-cost areas.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs.

committee.name: House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Housing and Community Development.

committee.name: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 5/11/1994--Introduced. FHA Mortgage Upgrade Act - Amends the National Housing Act to revise single family housing insurance mortgage limitations.
